document_data.name: Stoneflight
document_data.Effects: This spell was cast on slingers, allowing them to launch their missiles father and with greater force. This spell could be cast on three individuals at a time. The amount of individuals was determined by the caster's spell level, up to a maximum of thirty people at a time. Any individual had to be within {{SI|30|yd|long=yes}} of the caster to gain this ability.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, casting this spell required a [[material component]] in the form of a small ball made from [[bird]] [[guano]].
